item.title: Can We Spot Energy Regressions using Developers Tests?
Diff-JJoules
item.description: Diff-JJoules Â· diff-jjoules is a tool to be integrated in your continuous integration in order to measure the impact of commits on the energy consumption of the program break the build in case of an energy regression has been detected. Install To use Diff-JJoules, you need to install JJoules and JUnit-JJoules. Then, you can install diff-jjoules: mvn clean install -DskipTest Usage The easiest way to use diff-jjoules, you need to clone your project twice: one for the version before applying the commit, and one for the version after applying the commit.

item.title: An approach and benchmark to detect behavioral changes of commits in continuous integration.
